data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The color of a radiating black-body tells the temperature of its radiating surface. It ____ responsible ____ the ____ of ____, which ____ from ____ red ( 2,500K ) ____ yellow ( 5,800K ) ____ white ____ blue-white ( 15,000K ) as ____ peak ____ passes ____ those ____ in ____ visible ____. When the peak is below the visible spectrum, the body is black, above the body is blue-white, since all the visible colors are represented from blue decreasing to red.
data.partBlankContent: The color of a radiating black-body tells the temperature of its radiating surface. It i_ responsible f__ the co___ of st___, which va__ from infr____ red ( 2,500K ) t_ yellow ( 5,800K ) t_ white a__ blue-white ( 15,000K ) as t__ peak radi____ passes thr____ those poi___ in t__ visible spec____. When the peak is below the visible spectrum, the body is black, above the body is blue-white, since all the visible colors are represented from blue decreasing to red.
data.fullContent: The color of a radiating black-body tells the temperature of its radiating surface. It is responsible for the color of stars, which vary from infrared red ( 2,500K ) to yellow ( 5,800K ) to white and blue-white ( 15,000K ) as the peak radiance passes through those points in the visible spectrum. When the peak is below the visible spectrum, the body is black, above the body is blue-white, since all the visible colors are represented from blue decreasing to red.
data.answer: 辐射黑体的颜色反映了它辐射表面的温度。它决定了恒星的颜色，从红外红色(2,500K)到黄色(5,800K)，再到白色和蓝白色(15,000K)，当峰值辐射穿过这些可见光谱点时。当峰在可见光谱下面时，物体是黑色的，物体上面是蓝白色的，因为所有的可见颜色都是从蓝色逐渐变为红色的。
